description:
Asahi is on a quest to take down a party who uses its status for evil, but one of their crimes hits a little close to home—falsifying ranks. An adventurer who is suspicious of Asahi decides to take a closer look at him. Will Asahi’s secret be discovered?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Raise My Sword Against a Girl
Je lève pas mon épée sur les filles
Onnanoko ni Ken wa Furenai yo
女の子に剣は振れないよ
